get.description: Use this call to get all of the active transfers related to this location Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to get all active transfers for all locations Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Use this call to create a new transfer request with default reference number Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to create a new transfer request from discrepancies Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to delete a transfer Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to delete a property from the transfer Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to get a warehouse transfer object with items Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Use this call to change a transfer's status Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to add a note to the transfer Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to add a note to a bin Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to add an item to the transfer (only works for transfers in draft/request states) Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to add multiple items to the transfer (only works for transfers in draft/request states) Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to add a property to the transfer. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to remove an item from a transfer. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to change the transfer reference number (this call only works before the transfer is in transit) Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to update the from location of a transfer. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to update the to location of a transfer. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to update the from and to locations of a transfer. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to change a property belonging to a given transfer. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to retrieve a list of items on the order and request/sent/received levels. This method will return multiple entries for a single item if the item exists in multiple bins. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Use this call to change the requested quantity for an item on a transfer in Draft or Request states. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to change the sent quantity of an item in the specified bin. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to change the received quantity of a transfer item. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to retrieve a list of transfer-level notes for a given transfer. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to retrieve the notes from a transfer item. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: pkTransferId
parameters.description: The id of the transfer to which the item belongs.

parameters.name: pkTransferItemId
parameters.description: The id of the transfer item.

post.description: Use this call to add a note to a transfer item. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to retrieve all of the audit entries for the specified transfer. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: pkTransferId
parameters.description: The id of the transfer to retrieve audit entries for.

get.description: Use this call to retrieve a list of properties associated with a given transfer. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to retrieve all of the archived transfers in the system (i.e. Delivered or Deleted). Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: entriesPerPage
parameters.description: The number of entries to be returned per page.

parameters.name: entriesPerPage
parameters.description: The number of entries to be returned per page.

parameters.name: entriesPerPage
parameters.description: The number of entries to be returned per page.

get.description: Use this call to retrieve a basic list of transfers which have been significantly modified between the specified UTC date and now. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to get a transfer object with its items. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: pkTransferId
parameters.description: The id of the transfer to be loaded.

post.description: Use this call to change details of a bin. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to allocate stock, in part or in full, from one bin to another. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to create a new bin. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to delete bins with no items. To be used if a bin is created and no items are assigned to it. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to retrieve notes from a specific bin. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to get a list of items whose quantities do not match those that were originally expected. E.g. Received < Sent when Delivered or Sent < Requested when Accepted. Only call this method once after the transfer is Accepted and once when it has been Delivered. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to retrieve information on inbound transfers and purchase orders for the given transfer item. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to work out if a draft transfer has been changed since it was created. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: pkTransferId
parameters.description: The id of the transfer to check.

post.description: Use this call to delete a draft transfer with no items, properties or notes. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseTransferNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: fromLocationId

The id of the bin item.
